string_table.str: Enemies to the north!
Hostiles coming in from the north!
The enemy are sending in units from the north-east!
We've got enemies inbound from the north-east!
They're sending in units from the east!
Enemies incoming from the east!
We have enemies coming in from the north and east!
Enemies inbound along north and east routes!
They're coming in from everywhere!
Enemies inbound from all routes! Repeat, enemies inbound from ALL routes!
Douglas, they've sent in Banshees to attack the base!
The base is under fire from Banshees!
They're attacking our second base!
They're sending in Hunters to take out our Kodiaks!
We've got signals on the monitors again! A lot of them! Infantry to the north-east!
Reaver! Isabel briefed me on them! They're bypassing the ravines! We need to take them out or they'll be at the cannon in no time!
Acknowledged. Calculating trajectories now.
So long!
Should've packed a chute!
Watch your step!
I'm never going to get tired of doing that!
Douglas, there's a surge of Banished at the east barricade!
The east barricade is under attack from the Banished, we've got to protect it!
Don't let them break through the east barricade! We need to defend it!
We need to defend the east barricade! The Banished are trying to break through!
The enemy is trying to break through the west barricade, we can't lose it!
Douglas, the west barricade is under attack!
Banished at the west barricade!
The Banished are attacking the west barricade!
Douglas, we're going to lose the west barricade if we don't stop the Banished there!
The west barricade is being destroyed, we've got to stop them breaking through!
We're in danger of losing the west barricade, Douglas!
They've nearly broken through the west barricade!
The east barricade is under heavy attack, if we lose it, they'll be able to get through!
The Banished are breaking through the east barricade!
The enemy has nearly destroyed the east barricade!
The east barricade is almost destroyed, we've got to stop them!
Douglas, we've lost the east barricade! The Banished have broken through!
The west barricade is down! The Banished are coming through!
That's both barricades down, Douglas. We're going to have to fight harder to defend the cannon now!
Douglas, the Particle Cannon is under attack! You've got to push them back!
We've got to protect the particle cannon until it breaks through the shields!
The particle cannon is taking hits! We've got to protect it!
The particle cannon is at twenty-percent integrity! We're going to lose it!
The particle cannon won't last much longer! If we lose it, we lose everything!
They're targeting the particle cannon! We can't lose it!
Enemies are closing in on our particle cannon!
Enemies at the particle cannon! Clear them out!
Captain, we could use some help. Requesting a Cyclops drop.
The Particle Cannon's taken damage! We need to repair it with restoration drones!
Douglas, the Banished have activated the lightbridge, it'll give them a shorter route to the cannon!
Captain, an ODST drop would be appreciated right now.
Douglas, the monitors have gone quiet - for now.
Douglas, I'm starting to get early warning alerts on those monitors. The Banished will be here soon!
Douglas, that amber looks awfully fragile, could we use that to cut off some of their routes?
We need some defences! Captain, requesting a turret drop!
Douglas, the cannon's nearly broken through the carrier's shields. I just need a little bit longer.
A
That was him.
F
Infantry to the north-east!
Enemy armor coming from the east!
More armor, this time from the north-east!
Wraiths to the north-east!
They're sending in infantry from the east!
We have a Hunter and infantry coming from the north-east, they're after our base!
More infantry from the east!
Enemy vehicles inbound from the east!
Wraiths and Locusts from the north-east!
The monitors are lit up again - wait, they're coming in from a new route! We've got enemy vehicles inbound from the east!
Enemy armor from the east, Douglas!
They're sending in more Ghosts from the east!
Douglas! Another charge of Ghosts from the east!
Douglas! One of their Wraiths is making a beeline for our base!
Infantry and enemy armor coming from the north-east!
Douglas, to the north! The Banished have sent in a couple of Wraiths!
More vehicles to the north-east! They've got a Locust!
Another Wraith incoming from the north-east!
Enemy vehicles inbound from the north-east!
Here they come! Infantry coming in from the north!
More ground troops coming in from the north!
Douglas, we've got Hunters coming from the north!
W
Infantry coming from the north-east!
Jump Brutes to the east!
Uh oh, we've got a wave of suicide grunts coming from the north-east.
Jump Brutes coming from the north, they're heading towards our base!
Suicide Grunts inbound from the east!
Monitors show enemy vehicles coming from the east.
They're sending in a Locust from the east to attack our base!
More vehicles from the east, they've got heavy armor this time!
Ghosts and Wraiths inbound from the east!
Douglas, we've got Wraiths coming from the east!
Ground troops coming in from the east, heading directly towards our base. Looks like they're support for a Locust strike!
Douglas, you have enemy infantry coming in, this time from the north-east!
Hunters and infantry to the north-east!
Infantry inbound from the north-east!
More infantry from the north-east!
We have more infantry inbound from the north!
Douglas, Hunters to the north!
Ah, little Spartan - I see you've recovered from our introduction. It seems you need another 'lesson'.
Douglas, Professor! The Shipmaster has diverted some of his air units from the attack on the Spirit of Fire. They're heading your way.
I can overload the cannon and deliver one huge final blast, but it'll completely shut it down afterwards.
Here goes.
It worked! The shields are down!
Hard to estimate, Captain, this thing didn't exactly come with instructions. I'll draw as much power as I can into the cannon, but we're going to make one heck of a target.
I've set up monitoring equipment along each of the possible routes, so I can alert Douglas as the Banished arrive.
P
D
T
Agreed. Douglas, the Banished carrier is Atriox's biggest weapon and only means of slipstream transport, so he'll be sending everything he can to destroy that cannon.
And with Atriox redirecting all his forces your way, he'll be leaving the base beneath the carrier relatively clear, giving Jerome and Isabel a chance to infiltrate it.
They'll be standing by for word when you've broken through the carrier's shields. Hold the line, team.
Nice shooting, Professor! Get ready for extraction back to the Spirit of Fire. Jerome, this is Douglas. The shield is down and you are a go.
Now that we've crippled their portals, the Banished will have to make a traditional frontal assault using whatever local forces they have.
To reach the cannon, the Banished will have to pass through those choke points to the east and west, so we've set up UNSC barriers there to defend them.
We need to make sure they hold fast.
Roger that, Douglas. Now get your troops clear. You don't want to be down there when Isabel gets started.
Kodiaks One and Two, this is Douglas. Stop as many as you can from reaching the east and west barriers. Stay alert.
Got it, Professor. I'll see what I can do.
Jerome, this is Douglas. We've got a confirmed hit on the carrier's shield. It's going to take a while to punch through but it's working.
Way ahead of you.
Sure thing, Professor. Think they've taken enough punishment yet?
Atriox.
Good. I've got some anger to work off.
These guys are relentless! I can see how they managed to survive the Covenant during the war!
If we lose that, we won't be able to hold the line. Let's make sure that doesn't happen.
Roger that, Anders. Target those Wraiths, troops! We can't let them through!
They'll wreck our barricades in no time. Let's head them off, fast!
We need to get some anti-air defenses, ASAP! Turrets! Wolverines!
Hunters? Make sure our Kodiaks are protected!
What's the status on that shield? It's Banished central down here!
You got it.
They're trying to split our forces. Stay sharp.
Head them off fast before they can detonate!
I
I
Defend the base, troops!
I
L
Good to hear. We're making our way now. Keep that carrier busy for us.
Banished Reavers are anti-air walkers that have the predatory leap ability to jump over obstacles.
East Barricade
West Barricade
Particle Cannon
The Cannon is damaged. Use Restoration Drones to heal it.
Cannon Health
Kill the Brutes near the terminal before you can use it to turn the lightbridge off.
Defend the Particle Cannon
Kill 10 enemies with the lightbridge
Units killed by lightbridge:
Deactivate the lightbridge while enemy units are crossing to drop them into the chasm below.
Kill 5 units with Turret Drop
Units killed by Turret Drop:
Use the Turret Drop leader power to kill 5 enemy units. Access the power by holding @Left_Trigger@.
Keep the barricades intact
The barricades are a critical part of the cannon's defenses, keep them intact throughout the invasion.
Build on all available base plots
Base plots occupied:
Locate and build on all available base plots to increase your chances against the Banished invasion.
Carrier Health
Carrier shield breach in...
Long range Siege Turrets are available to build at your base.
Lightbridge Terminal
Mission Timer
